entry.def: If you refer to the aforementioned person or subject, you mean the person or subject that has already been mentioned.

example.ex: A declaration will be issued at the end of the aforementioned UN conference.
example.tran: 前面提到的那次联合国会议将于闭幕之际发表一份宣言。

means.word_mean: 1. being the one previously mentioned or spoken of;
